verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you, then shall the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w keep|strong="H7673"\w* a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 25.2 \ft keep: Heb. rest\f*

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* in the \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* thereof;

But in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* shall be a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, a \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: thou shalt neither \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* thy \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, nor \w prune|strong="H2168"\w* thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

That which groweth of its own \w accord|strong="H5599"\w* of thy \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* thou shalt not \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*, neither \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* the \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* of thy vine \w undressed|strong="H5139"\w*: \add for\add* it is a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w rest|strong="H7677"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 25.5 \ft of thy vine…: Heb. of thy separation\f*

And the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w meat|strong="H0402"\w* for you; for thee, and for thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and for thy \w maid|strong="H0519"\w*, and for thy hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w*, and for thy \w stranger|strong="H8453"\w* that \w sojourneth|strong="H1481"\w* with thee,

And for thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and for the \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* that \add are\add* in thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, shall all the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* thereof be \w meat|strong="H0398"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w number|strong="H5608"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* unto thee, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; and the \w space|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall be unto thee \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

Then shalt thou cause the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* of the \w jubile|strong="H8643"\w* to \w sound|strong="H5674"\w* on the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w atonement|strong="H3725"\w* shall ye make the \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w sound|strong="H5674"\w* throughout all your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 25.9 \ft of the jubile: Heb. loud of sound\f*

And ye shall \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* the \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* throughout \add all\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* unto all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof: it shall be a \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* unto you; and ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, and ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*.

A \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* shall that \w fiftieth|strong="H2572"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* be unto you: ye shall not \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, neither \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* that which \w groweth|strong="H5599"\w* of itself in it, nor \w gather|strong="H1219"\w* \add the grapes\add* in it of thy vine \w undressed|strong="H5139"\w*.

For it \add is\add* the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*; it shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto you: ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* thereof out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.
In the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of this \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* unto his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

And if thou \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* \w ought|strong="H4465"\w* unto thy \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*, or \w buyest|strong="H7069"\w* \add ought\add* of thy \w neighbour’s|strong="H5997"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, ye shall not \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w*:

According to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* thou shalt \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* of thy \w neighbour|strong="H5997"\w*, \add and\add* according unto the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* he shall \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* unto thee:

\w According|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* the \w price|strong="H4736"\w* thereof, and \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w fewness|strong="H4591"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w diminish|strong="H4591"\w* the \w price|strong="H4736"\w* of it: for \add according\add* to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \add of the years\add* of the \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* doth he \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* unto thee.

Ye shall not therefore \w oppress|strong="H3238"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H5997"\w*; but thou shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Wherefore ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* my \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* them; and ye shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in \w safety|strong="H0983"\w*.

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* her \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, and ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* your \w fill|strong="H7648"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein in \w safety|strong="H0983"\w*.

And if ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall we \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*? behold, we shall not \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, nor \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* in our \w increase|strong="H8393"\w*:

Then I will \w command|strong="H6680"\w* my \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* upon you in the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and it shall bring \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* for \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And ye shall \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add yet\add* of \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \w fruit|strong="H8393"\w* until the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; until her \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* come \w in|strong="H0935"\w* ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* the \w old|strong="H3465"\w* \add store\add*.

¶ The \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall not be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* for \w ever|strong="H6783"\w*: for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* mine; for ye \add are\add* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* and \w sojourners|strong="H8453"\w* with me.\f + \fr 25.23 \ft for ever: or, to be quite cut off: Heb. for cutting off\f*
And in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* ye shall \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* a \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ If thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* be waxen \w poor|strong="H4134"\w*, and hath \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* away \add some\add* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, and if any of his \w kin|strong="H7138"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* it, then shall he \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* that which his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w sold|strong="H4465"\w*.

And if the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* have none to \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* it, and \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* be \w able|strong="H1767"\w* to \w redeem|strong="H4672"\w* it;\f + \fr 25.26 \ft himself…: Heb. his hand hath attained and found sufficiency\f*

Then let him \w count|strong="H2803"\w* the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w sale|strong="H4465"\w* thereof, and \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* the \w overplus|strong="H5736"\w* unto the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to whom he \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* it; that he may \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

But if \w he|strong="H3027"\w* be not \w able|strong="H1767"\w* to \w restore|strong="H4672"\w* \add it\add* to him, then that which is \w sold|strong="H4465"\w* shall remain in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of him that hath \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* it until the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*: and in the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w* it shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and he shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

And if a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* a \w dwelling|strong="H4186"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in a \w walled|strong="H2346"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, then he may \w redeem|strong="H1353"\w* it within a \w whole|strong="H8552"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* after it is \w sold|strong="H4465"\w*; \add within\add* a full \w year|strong="H3117"\w* may he \w redeem|strong="H1353"\w* it.

And if it be not \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* within the \w space|strong="H4390"\w* of a \w full|strong="H8549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, then the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w walled|strong="H2346"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w established|strong="H6965"\w* for \w ever|strong="H6783"\w* to him that \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* it throughout his \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: it shall not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*.

But the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* which have no \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them shall be \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* as the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: they may be \w redeemed|strong="H1353"\w*, and they shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*.\f + \fr 25.31 \ft they may…: Heb. redemption belongeth unto it\f*

Notwithstanding the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \add and\add* the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, may the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1353"\w* at any \w time|strong="H5769"\w*.

And if a man \w purchase|strong="H1350"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, then the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* that was \w sold|strong="H4465"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in \add the year of\add* \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*: for the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add are\add* their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 25.33 \ft a man…: or, one of the Levites redeem them\f*

But the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* may not be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w*; for it \add is\add* their \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

¶ And if thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* be waxen \w poor|strong="H4134"\w*, and fallen in \w decay|strong="H4131"\w* with \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*; then thou shalt \w relieve|strong="H2388"\w* him: \add yea, though he be\add* a \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, or a \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w*; that he may \w live|strong="H2416"\w* with thee.\f + \fr 25.35 \ft fallen…: Heb. his hand faileth\f*\f + \fr 25.35 \ft relieve: Heb. strengthen\f*

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* thou no \w usury|strong="H5392"\w* of him, or \w increase|strong="H8636"\w*: but \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; that thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* may \w live|strong="H2416"\w* with thee.

Thou shalt not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him thy \w money|strong="H3701"\w* upon \w usury|strong="H5392"\w*, nor \w lend|strong="H5414"\w* him thy \w victuals|strong="H0400"\w* for \w increase|strong="H4768"\w*.

I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which brought you \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \add and\add* to be your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And if thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \add that dwelleth\add* by thee be waxen \w poor|strong="H4134"\w*, and be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* unto thee; thou shalt not \w compel|strong="H5647"\w* him to \w serve|strong="H5656"\w* as a \w bondservant|strong="H5650"\w*:\f + \fr 25.39 \ft compel…: Heb. serve thyself with him with the service, etc\f*

\add But\add* as an hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w*, \add and\add* as a \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w*, he shall be with thee, \add and\add* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee unto the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*:

And \add then\add* shall he \w depart|strong="H3318"\w* from thee, \add both\add* he and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* with him, and shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto his own \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, and unto the \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* of his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall he \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

For they \add are\add* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, which I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: they shall not be \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w as|strong="H4466"\w* \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*.\f + \fr 25.42 \ft as…: Heb. with the sale of a bondman\f*
Thou shalt not \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* over him with \w rigour|strong="H6531"\w*; but shalt \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Both thy \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w bondmaids|strong="H0519"\w*, which thou shalt have, \add shall be\add* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* that are round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* you; of them shall ye \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w bondmen|strong="H5650"\w* and \w bondmaids|strong="H0519"\w*.

Moreover of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w strangers|strong="H8453"\w* that do \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* among you, of them shall ye \w buy|strong="H7069"\w*, and of their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* that \add are\add* with you, which they \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* in your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and they shall be your \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

And ye shall take them as an \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* for your \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* you, to \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \add them for\add* a \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*; they shall be your \w bondmen|strong="H5647"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: but over your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, ye shall not \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* over \w another|strong="H0251"\w* with \w rigour|strong="H6531"\w*.\f + \fr 25.46 \ft they…: Heb. ye shall serve yourselves with them\f*

¶ And if a \w sojourner|strong="H1616"\w* or \w stranger|strong="H8453"\w* wax \w rich|strong="H5381"\w* by \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*, and thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \add that dwelleth\add* by him wax \w poor|strong="H4134"\w*, and \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* himself unto the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \add or\add* \w sojourner|strong="H8453"\w* by thee, or to the \w stock|strong="H6133"\w* of the \w stranger’s|strong="H1616"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w*:\f + \fr 25.47 \ft wax rich…: Heb. his hand obtain, etc\f*

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* that he is \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* he may be redeemed \w again|strong="H1353"\w*; \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* may \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* him:

Either his \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w*, or his \w uncle’s|strong="H1730"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, may \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* him, or \add any\add* that is \w nigh|strong="H7607"\w* of \w kin|strong="H1320"\w* unto him of his \w family|strong="H4940"\w* may \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* him; or if he be \w able|strong="H5381"\w*, he may \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w*.

And he shall \w reckon|strong="H2803"\w* with him that \w bought|strong="H7069"\w* him from the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* that he was \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* to him unto the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*: and the \w price|strong="H3701"\w* of his \w sale|strong="H4465"\w* shall be according unto the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, according to the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* of an hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w* shall it be with him.

If \add there be\add* yet \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \add behind\add*, \w according|strong="H6310"\w* unto them he shall give \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the price of his \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w* out of the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* that he was \w bought|strong="H4736"\w* for.

And if there \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* but \w few|strong="H4592"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* unto the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, then he shall \w count|strong="H2803"\w* with him, \add and\add* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* unto his \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall he give him \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the price of his \w redemption|strong="H1353"\w*.

\add And\add* as a \w yearly|strong="H8141"\w* hired \w servant|strong="H7916"\w* shall he be with him: \add and the other\add* shall not \w rule|strong="H7287"\w* with \w rigour|strong="H6531"\w* over him in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And if he be not \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* in these \add years\add*, then he shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w jubile|strong="H3104"\w*, \add both\add* he, and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* with him.\f + \fr 25.54 \ft in these…: or, by these means\f*

For unto me the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add are\add* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; they \add are\add* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* whom I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
